content:
In the Kharkiv region, a civilian man was killed during the Russian shelling.

About thisreportedin the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration.

“As a result of enemy artillery shelling in the Chuguev district, a 72-year-old man was killed. The emergency happened today at about 10:00 in the village of Vovchansky farms of the Volchansk community, ”the message reads.

In the police of Kharkiv regionInformedthat investigators opened criminal proceedings under Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine - violation of the laws and customs of war.

As the Armyinform Writing, todayRussian troopsThey hit several dronesAccording to the "point of indomitable" in the Kherson region, three people were injured.
title: In Kharkiv region a man was killed as a result of Russian shelling
description: This was reported in the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. "In result...
author: Army Inform
